summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Winona Avenue, from Woodland Park Avenue to North 77th Street; by constructing sewers together with necessary appurtenances; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8395 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
